text: Laroque-des-Albères () is a commune in the Pyrénées-Orientales department in southern France. It is part of the Occitanie region. The town is in the foothills of the Pyrénées mountains. == Geography == === Localisation === Laroque-des-Albères is located in the canton of Vallespir-Albères and in the arrondissement of Céret.
